Its the 13th, and the char limits are now applying in full force. KSL,
Rdahl, and JP, I know you guys have more than 7 chars on at least one
faction that you guys are supporting, but you can't post for more than
7 now, so get rid of all the rest. Others might also have more. Get
that taken care of.
